sv.purpose: To test if referral criteria of a CKD patient are met to refer to either urological services or a specialist (nephrologist).
sv.misuse:
Implementation notes [2019/06/03 JB]
- Some rules not implemented due to concept coding issues (e.g. suspected renal artery stenosis) and to modeling issues (e.g. change in GFR category)
- Use of additional specific FHIR profile to have a local placehoslder for a boolean variable (FHIR-STU3-Observation.ckd-referral-variable.v0) 
- One reconcilaition rule added: R1.3.DM-RF13a. 
- Execution in GDL2 editor works
- Modified rule 1.3c splitted into 1.3c and 1.3d  + corrected referral coding in sct
- [10/01/2019: prepared multilingual support (en/sv/es)]
- [11/01/2019: adaptation to GDL2 Editor v2.3.0 - max(effectiveDateTime)]
- [24/01/2019: include full mappings for CDSM terminologies]
- [25/01/2019: include validated translations for Swedish and Spanish]
- [30/01/2019: include codes for local terminologies]
- [20/02/2019: Correction for READ2 and ICD-10-SE identifiers]
- [10/03/2019: New code for Renal outflow obstruction and haematuria]
- [03/06/2019: Multiple units for ACR by JB]
- [16/09/2019: ICD-10-UK (and READ) update for CKD, HF, Diabetes and AF by JB]
- [14/01/2020: missing translations (issue 334) by JB]

gt0001.description: This guideline service deals with the referral algorithm of Chronic Kidney Disease patients to either urological services or a specialist.It implements the flowchart '5.4.6. Referral Criteria' of deliverable D7.1 of the C3Cloud project.This flowchart is based on the NICE CKD guideline CG182, Chapter 1.3, Table 2 [60, p. 26]. It describes the conditions for referral. The patient should not be referred if they are not met.This CDSM accounts for DM-RF reconciliation rules specified in deliverable D7.2 of the C3Cloud project.

gt0063.text: *(en) R1.4-Card 2: Discuss with or send to specialist

gt0065.text: Diskutera med, eller remittera till specialist

gt0066.text: Överväg att diskutera handläggningen med en specialist via brev, e-post eller telefon i de fall där ett specialistbesök inte bedöms vara nödvändigt

gt0073.text: *(en) R1.3.DM-RF13a DM AND eGFR > 45 AND ACR > 3

gt0075.text: *(en) R1.3d ACR>=70 AND DM AND (NOT diabetes therapy)

gt0076.text: *(en) Copy of R1.3c ACR>=70 and (NOT (DM AND diabetes therapy))

gt0001.description: This guideline service deals with the referral algorithm of Chronic Kidney Disease patients to either urological services or a specialist.It implements the flowchart '5.4.6. Referral Criteria' of deliverable D7.1 of the C3Cloud project.This flowchart is based on the NICE CKD guideline CG182, Chapter 1.3, Table 2 [60, p. 26]. It describes the conditions for referral. The patient should not be referred if they are not met.This CDSM accounts for DM-RF reconciliation rules specified in deliverable D7.2 of the C3Cloud project.

gt0063.text: R1.4-Card 2: Discuss with or send to specialist

gt0065.text: Discuss with or send to specialist

gt0066.text: Consider discussing management issues with a specialist by letter, email or telephone in cases where it may not be necessary for the person with CKD to be seen by the specialist

gt0073.text: R1.3.DM-RF13a DM AND eGFR > 45 AND ACR > 3

gt0075.text: R1.3d ACR>=70 AND DM AND (NOT diabetes therapy)

gt0076.text: Copy of R1.3c ACR>=70 and (NOT (DM AND diabetes therapy))

gt0001.text: Servicio de derivación de la Guía para la Insuficiencia renal crónica
gt0001.description: This guideline service deals with the referral algorithm of Chronic Kidney Disease patients to either urological services or a specialist.It implements the flowchart '5.4.6. Referral Criteria' of deliverable D7.1 of the C3Cloud project.This flowchart is based on the NICE CKD guideline CG182, Chapter 1.3, Table 2 [60, p. 26]. It describes the conditions for referral. The patient should not be referred if they are not met.This CDSM accounts for DM-RF reconciliation rules specified in deliverable D7.2 of the C3Cloud project.

gt0063.text: *(en) R1.4-Card 2: Discuss with or send to specialist

gt0065.text: Cambie impresiones con o envíelo al especialista

gt0066.text: Considere discutir los problemas de gestión con el especialista por carta, correo electrónico o  teléfono en aquello casos en que puede no ser necesario que la persona con Infuciencia renal crónica sea visto por el especialista

gt0073.text: *(en) R1.3.DM-RF13a DM AND eGFR > 45 AND ACR > 3

gt0075.text: *(en) R1.3d ACR>=70 AND DM AND (NOT diabetes therapy)

gt0076.text: *(en) Copy of R1.3c ACR>=70 and (NOT (DM AND diabetes therapy))
